description: An instrument ofthe bards is an exquisite example of it kind, superior to an ordinary instrument in every way. Seven types of these instruments exist, each named after a legendary bard college. The following table lists the spells common to all instruments, as well as the spells specific to each one and its rarity. A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 2d4 psychic damage.

You can use an action to play the instrument and cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.

When you use the instrument to cast a spell that causes targets to become charmed on a failed save, the targets have disadvantage on the saving throw. This effect applies whether you are using the instrument as the source of the spell or as a spellcasting focus.

| All                  | -         | *Fly*, *invisibility*, *levitate*, *protection from evil and good*, plus the spells listed for the particular instrument <spell>Fly</spell> <spell>Invisibility</spell> <spell>Levitate</spell> <spell>Protection from Evil and Good</spell>
| Anstruth harp        | Very rare | *Control weather*, *cure wounds* (5th level), *wall of thorns* <spell>Control Weather</spell> <spell>Cure Wounds</spell> <spell>Wall of Thorns</spell>

| Canaith mandolin     | Rare      | *Cure wounds* (3rd level), *dispel magic*, *protection from energy* (lightning only) <spell>Cure Wounds</spell> <spell>Dispel Magic</spell> <spell>Protection from Energy</spell>
| Cli lyre             | Rare      | *Stone shape*, *wall of fire*, *wind wall* <spell>Stone Shape</spell> <spell>Wall of Fire</spell> <spell>Wind Wall</spell>

| Doss lute            | Uncommon  | *Animal friendship*, *protection from energy* (fire only), *protection from poison* <spell>Animal Friendship</spell> <spell>Protection from Energy</spell> <spell>Protection from Poison</spell>

| Fochlucan bandalore  | Uncommon  | *Entangle*, *faerie fire*, *shillelagh*, *speak with animals* <spell>Entangle</spell> <spell>Faerie Fire</spell> <spell>Shillelagh</spell> <spell>Speak with Animals</spell>
| Mac-Fuirmidh cittern | Uncommon  | *Barkskin*, *cure wounds*, *fog cloud* <spell>Barkskin</spell> <spell>Cure Wounds</spell> <spell>Fog Cloud</spell>
| Ollamh harp          | Legendary | *Confusion*, *control weather*, *fire storm* <spell>Confusion</spell> <spell>Control Weather</spell> <spell>Fire Storm</spell>
name: Instrument of the Bards
